import "./App.css"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function App() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("https://fake-rest-api-nodejs.herokuapp.com/products") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setProducts(data); }) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }, []); return (

Product List

{products.map((product) => ( ))}
# Name Price Quantity Image
{product.id} {product.name} {product.price} {product.quantity}
); } export default App;
